text: Reveal to me everything you find ugly about yourself, so I can reveal to you everything I find beautiful about you.
author: Juansen Dizon

text:
Like two stars in the depths of the sky
This gravity is just irresistible
We spin around each other, you and I
When I fell for you, I fell into your orbit.
author: Justin Wetch

text:
I'm wrapped in you.
Melting in your silhouette
and becoming one,
a strange contour of love,
flowing with the wind.
author: Emily Brandt

text: I bet you make babies smile
You're awesome, I'm glad to have a friend like you who's cheerful and hardworking.
author: Hwaitingh

text: It's okay to not be okay
You are not bothering anyone at all, they would love to hear more of your thoughts
You've already survived the things you didn't think you'd survive

You're strong
and you can get through everything one step at a time
Treat yourself better, you deserve it

You mean so much to your friends and family,
they may not say it as often but they really do love you

You're loved,
someone out there loves you more than you think
If happiness were a currency, your existence would be a treasure trove
If laughter is the best medicine, consider yourself a walking pharmacy

You're like a human-shaped confetti cannon of joy
spreading delight wherever you go
You're the Picasso of good moods, and every day is your canvas
If smiles were music notes, you'd be a symphony
You'r voice is contagious!, it lights up the room
You're always there for your friends, that's what makes you special
Just wanted to let you know I'm thinking of you and hoping you have a great day!

The universe whispers your name within every sunrise.
Remember, you matter
You are a melody waiting to be played. Don't be afraid to raise your voice
You are a constellation of possibilities, waiting to shine
Don't be afraid to shine. Your light is unique
You are like a ray of sunshine (even on cloudy days)
You're the kind of person who makes even Mondays feel like a weekend adventure
